attributes.action: Mandate that airlines and travel agents quote only a fully inclusive price for a flight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prices quoted for international flights has become a nonsense, because the airlines are free to only advertise a portion of the real cost of the ticket, and call the rest a surcharge. Some surcharges are now higher than the original quoted price. High fuel prices are now a fact of life, why keep up the pretense that this is somehow temporary situation.
